name: Adam Behr
text: This has been the worst experience. Every time I have tried to access my unit I have had problems. First time they had not removed their lock so I could not open the unit and their is no one to contact after hours. Next day I went during business hours and they removed the lock but it still had someone else's junk in it. So then they gave me a different unit. They told me they would give me half off my next month's rent for my trouble, but when the rent was due they took the full amount anyway. I'm not the type to complain (or write these reviews) so I let it go.  The next time I went to the unit they have placed one of their locks on it. Again after hours and no one can be contacted. They better have a good reason for taking my money and still putting a lock on my unit. I am very disappointed and frustrated. I hope this review keeps others from having the same problem.

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your storage experience.  We apologize it has not been a smooth one.  Your comments are warranted.  The confusion is on our end and unfortunately, you caught the brunt of it to no fault of your own.  Our Store Manager and District Manager will reach out to you to discuss.  We appreciate your business and hope you give us the opportunity to correct the situation.

name: April Wade's Nostalgia Network
text:
I rented there for 2 months based on a special, which the facility to go back on during the second month.  Due to a financial hardship I vacated the unit on the 5th day of the third month to be told that I was responsible for an entire month despite moving out on the 5th, (something no other facility does as they prorate up to a specific day when you move out), then on top of it discovered water damage to several items in my unit that were a result of gaps between the wall and ceiling (the site manager's words, not mine).  Now, after having filed a claim for my damaged property, something done at the first part of the month I received an email on 12/26/15 advising me my claim was denied due to "rent owed".  I suggested deducting anything owed from the claim for my property and was bluntly told by corporate that there was nothing they could do.

Keep in ,mind that I entrusted my property to this facility and was FORCED to pay for protection that I never requested, then when I need to utilize it I'm denied that because I refuse to be overcharged on a substandard unit that allowed damage to my items. If they will do this to me who else will they do this to?

resp.text:
Hi April,

Thank you for sharing your recent storage experience with us.  We apologize it was not a positive one.  As communicated to you by our store manager, we are unable to process the claim as the items were already removed from the property.  As a courtesy we will forgo the last month’s rent.  Thank you for your business.  We wish you the best.

name: Staci Shelton
text:
I have been with IStorage for about 2 years now. My grandson graduated high school and was offered a full scholarship at Auburn University. As an average family we made the decision to rent my home and I would move in with my daughter and assist with getting him through college. So I packed up my most precious belongings and searched for a climate controlled unit for myself. The staff were most helpful and assisted me in getting an end unit so that I could get to my things easily if needed. Being a single woman and trusting your entire life being put into storage can be so stressful. However Ashley has been great, her kind words and helpful attitude have made me feel comfortable about leaving my life of independence and helping to write a new chapter in life for my grandson. I certainly hope that IStorage knows what a wonderful employee they have in Ashley. I would not hesitate to recommend this facility to anyone for their storage needs. I still have 2 more years to go before I can once again be independent and I can do that with no worries
Thank you so much Ashley !!!!

name: Mik S
text:
the office staff is great.    They are super nice, helpful and friendly.  Nothing but good things to say about them.
but you can tell "corporate america" has taken over.   I've never had to fill out so many forms in my life to rent a storage building.  They wanted my car insurance, car registration, home owners insurance, etc to store items (car and household items).    .     Prices are also high. $25 paperwork fee. (or whatever you call it) and   $120 a month for a 10x20.

I just called and "covered storage" for my boat is $137/month.    I can keep it in the local "dry storage" Marina where it's kept inside protected from freezing and put in the water any time I want for $130 per month, with full service.   You call their local phone number and it also goes to a corporate 800 number call desk. This place was a LOT cheaper before it became an "iStorage" franchise. (used to be "The Storage Place).

Overall it was a good experience and the office staff was great, and unit was cleane.  I just thought it was high prices and too much paperwork.

resp.text: Hi Mik, My name is Judy. Thanks for sharing how nice and helpful the staff was to you, we appreciate those kind words. Please contact the facility and they will help your resolve this issue. Thank you.

name: Chris Overall
text: Priced to High

resp.text: We value all our customers and work hard to keep our prices competitive and fair. Unfortunately, operating cost such as property taxes, insurance, maintenance, utilities, overhead, etc. are not stable and increase year over year.  For us to maintain excellent service levels we must pass along a portion of those increases to our customers.  In addition, unlike several of our competitors who raise rents every couple of months, we process increases annually.  We are continuing to make improvements throughout the facility including asphalt, paint and building repairs to ensure that your experience at iStorage is the best possible. We look forward to serving you in the future. If there is anything more we can do to improve your experience please email us at info@istorage.com or give us a call toll free at 844-311-2342. Best Regards, the iStorage Team.

name: Michael Jowell
text:
Rick was very pleasant and helpful. Facility looks clean and well maintained.
The drainage at this place is impressive, Birmingham had significant flash flooding last night and there was no water incursion in my storage unit.

EDIT: It was a breeze closing out when i was done storing. Didn't even have to do anything, i suspect they're keeping an eye on who is coming and going, and when. When i approached Rick to say i was bailing, i forgot to say my building letter but he already knew what it was. This suggests to me that a close eye is being kept on the place, which is exactly what you want in a storage facility.

resp.text: Hi Michael, your kind words are appreciated! We make it a priority to provide clean, well-maintained facilities and are so glad to hear your experience with Rick reflects that. Don't hesitate to reach out to us at 888-storage if you need anything!

name: Andy Kerns
text:
The staff are all friendly but the management policies are absolute trash and borderline criminal. Expect to have them randomly turn off autopay so they can charge you usurious fees!

We were charged $40 in fees, about 25% extra on top of the unit rent, for just 9 days late. They even locked us out of our unit to charge another fee to take the lock off. Again, all just days late, not even close to a month behind. Absolutely insane.

resp.text:
Hello Andy, we are sorry to hear that you had trouble with your payment. Prior to any late fees being applied, it is our procedure to call customers to inform them that their payment is coming due, with reminders and options on how to pay. We certainly apologize that this did not help you avoid late fees, but we want to help our cstomers have the best possible rental experience. If there is anything further you'd like to let us know, please reach out to us at feedback@istorage.com.

Sincerely,

text: I have had a unit at the Inverness location for many years. Since the Business became Simply Self Storage it has gone down to new lows. I like most here pay an incredible amount of money for a climate controlled unit and it is NOT!! The rear door was out for months and no lights in the back hall make the once excellent business a unacceptable storage location. The rates have gone up like clockwork and with a great deal of new competition I believe it is time to check them out. How sad.

resp.text: John, we are sorry to hear about your experience. Please email social@simplyss.com at your earliest convenience, and we will try to help sort this out. Thank you!

name: Jake Silcock
text: Horrible. I originally left a 5 star review because the property manager that I worked with setting up the account was great, but after using the service and closing my account I was still charged another 4 months. I emailed, called, and repeated and never could get anyone to answer or respond. The sales line will answer on the first ring so call them and try to get transferred if you can not get in contact.

resp.text: We are sorry to hear that you had a less than stellar move out experience. Moving out should not be a challenge to our customers, nor should getting the help and attention that they need when they encounter a problem. Your comments have been brought to the attention of our district and regional managers to find a way to streamline the process. If there is anything more we can do to improve your experience please email us at info@istorage.com or give us a call toll-free at 844-311-2342. Best Regards, the iStorage Team.

name: Baker Swedenburg
text:
If I could give negative stars I would. I've tried for 2 weeks now to cancel my unit as we have moved everything out. I've called the store manager multiple times and left messages, sent emails, and have even tried the district manager twice and left messages. I cannot get anyone on the phone or anyone to call me back. So now of course I'm being charged for another month because no one will call me back to cancel. This is while the unit is sitting empty by the way.

Caution to future people needing a storage solution. This is not it. Once they trap you, you cannot cancel. Ridiculous.

resp.text: That's the last thing that any business would want the customer experience to be. Moving out should be a seamless process, and should never require reaching out to multiple managers. This is not what we expect from our team, and apologize that this has been your experience. You will be contacted by the district manager and receive a refund for this most recent charge. If there is anything else, please contact us at info@istorage.com or give us a call toll-free at 844-311-2342. Best Regards, the iStorage Team.

name: Shana Foshee
text:
After selling my home I needed a clean, secure, climate controlled temporary home for everything I owned and worked so hard for. I needed someone I could trust.

Some people may think there is not a lot to consider when renting a storage unit. You pay your rent, visit your storage unit when you need to get something or put something in, and that's all there is to it. I disagree.

Nate, the property manager treated me like family from the time I walked into the office. After all, I am basically moving into his house.

Although I did not see Nate for five weeks while he protected all of my belongings, when I walked into the main entrance, an hour before they opened, he was already there and greeted me by name with a smile.

Moving is stressful. Do yourself a favor and let Nate take care of you and your belongings until you can take your belongings back home with you.

name: Derek Gardner
text: Fantastic place to store your belongings! Pam was courteous and accommodating. The facility is secure and safe. I would recommend The Guardian to anyone holding high value in their belongings.

name: C Coll
text: Great business and great people to deal with. Pam went way above and beyond to help us out in a very unique situation due to the pandemic. If you are looking for a self-storage, look no further.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your nice review.  We are one of the few locally owned facilities and customer satisfactions if Very important to us.

name: Leah Hunt
text: Clean and secure storage facility with super friendly and helpful staff!

name: Sarah Shepard
text: Very clean, convenient, safe, and easy to access for a self-storage facility. Would highly recommend to all those relocating to Huntsville, AL.

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to give us a review!

name: Dan Halcomb
text: I’ve stored items at The Guardian for at least the last four years (really, I’ve lost count), and have been very pleased. Access is easy but secure, the hallways and bathrooms are always very clean, and the manager is incredibly responsive. I’ve needed to change from multiple units to a single unit as I’ve incorporated stored items into my home, and then I finally got to the point where I could downsize my single unit. The Manager has always been so helpful finding available spaces in the complex that perfectly suit my needs at the time. I highly recommend The Guardian!

resp.text: Thank you so much Dan!  We appreciate you choosing The Guardian for your storge needs.

name: Clint Patterson (clintpatty)
text: This place is very well managed, especially for a storage unit facility. The owner is responsive, people clean regularly and it shows, multiple efforts are taken to discourage and/or find illegal drug activity, the only accepted form of payment is a credit card, it has all the dollies and carts I needed, very reasonable hours for accessing the secured entrances, and it's climate controlled. I never saw anything sketchy going on there the whole time I rented. I would use this place again if I had another move that required it, and this place would be a first choice for business use.

resp.text: Thank you Clint for taking time to post a review of our facility.

name: Christina South
text: Best self storage in Huntsville. Safe, inside storage that is clean and bug free. A climate and temperature controlled storage unit was important and the location is great. It is easy to get onto the interstate and quickly get anywhere in Huntsville. Highly recommend.

resp.text: Thank you Christina.

name: Melissa Jeffery
text: Guardian storage is well maintained and clean. We have used this storage facility for several years for business. The location is centrally located and convenient. I highly recommend this storage facility.

resp.text: Thank you Melissa!  Your trust and confidence is very important to us!

name: Terrell E Burrell
text: Never had a problem with the storage unit.  Facility was always nice and clean.  Whenever I had to enter the premises, I always felt safe. You can see what's going on via the cameras located throughout the facility and I liked the voice that announced "door is open" Management was extremely nice and very helpful when I need help.  There are carts to assist with your move and brooms to help clean when you move out.

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Sarah Jacobs
text: I use the Guardian for storage both personally and for my business.  Very clean, friendly service and convenient location!. Definitely recommend!

resp.text: Thank so much!

name: Brenda Terry
text: The Guardian Company climate controlled storage units are exceptionally clean with quick and easy access for loading and unloading ----- carts and dollies available to use are an extra bonus!  Security seems to be a top priority at this facility.  I have always felt safe and believe my possessions are safe and secure too!  The management is very responsive with excellent customer service.  I would not hesitate in recommending the use of this facility to anyone with storage needs!

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Paul Burns
text: Great facility.  Very clean.  I like the kiosk instead of having a person there.  Seems much quicker, and it doesn't have "mood" swings, lol.  The first time I stopped by to take a look at the place, I reviewed the kiosk and other info.  I called the number posted there because I wanted to see the units.  A lady (I believe her name is Pam), said she would come right then and show me around.  Didn't take her long at all to show up.  She was very, very nice, and I was thankful that she took time out of her day to come show me the place.  Needless to say I rented a locker, and not too long afterwards, upgrade to a larger size.  I used them for several years until I made room at home to move everything back.  The secure entry points is very nice and convenient.  The dollies, hand trucks, and other moving devices were very helpful.  I will definitely use this place again if I ever need some extra space.

resp.text: Thank you Paul.  So glad you Trusted The Guardian for your storage needs.

name: Darean Parker
text: I left to go on a deployment earlier this year. I left my car with this storage company. I was gone around 4 months. I felt good leaving my car here because they had a fenced it storage area that was secured by a gate and code, they also had cameras. I  called and emailed to check on my vehicle on a regular basis. Coming off deployment i had no problem getting a shipper to come get my car and also i got confirmation from the company that the car was being picked up and shipped. I would definitely store here again. Thanks Guys!!!

resp.text: Thank you Darean.

name: Brian Ridley
text: Having used other storage facilities in the past, I must say that The Guardian is above all the best one I have found. The owner is excellent and easy to work with, the facility is secure and provides a clean, easily accessible place to store my items. I have been a happy customer for over a year. Highly recommended!

resp.text: Thank you so much Brian.

text: Now that we've had the opportunity to actually use the facility and meet the manager, our earlier very positive impressions were confirmed. The facility is in very good physical condition, and the manager, Michelle, is a superstar.  Her care for her customers is such that she makes you feel like welcomed family coming into town. As military folks we have had a LOT of experience with storage faculties over the years, and we have never met anyone more professional, more helpful or nicer than Michelle. We are very glad we picked this facility!

name: T-ron Musiq
text:
This is by far the best storage facility in the area. Primarily due to the staff. I park my vehicle here and use it every two weeks or so. Every time i am greeted by the lovely Lawanda and when I leave I am also greeted by her aswell. When it’s cold outside and I park my car and awaiting my ride she always invites me in the office to stay warm, and when it’s hot outside and I’m awaiting my ride from dropping of my car at the Storage facility she offers water. Southern hospitality at its finest!!

One occasion battery died in my vehicle when I went to pick it up, and guess who was the only one on the shift...Lawanda Wood. She went out of her way to help, even providing me with jumper cables and using her own personal car to jumpstart my car, and did it with a smile! Without her I would have had to call a tow truck! She really saved the day!

I’m not sure if anyone will read this but I had to write a review and hopefully she is recognized and rewarded for her continuous outstanding work and customer Service at the Martin road location. Thank you for always going above and beyond for your customers. That’s why I pick this location over more fancy places. People like Lawanada make it worth it. :-)

Sincerely,
Your happy customer

Theron Lewis.

name: Chad Wilson,
text:
The lady on site is very helpful( I apologize for not remembering her name).  I had to move to another unit due to the fact the door got jammed and off its track.  We both were unable to pop back into place.  She helped me by crawling under and helped remove my stuff by sliding under the door.  I lucked out was was able to transfer to another unit. Same size and price.  She went to make the transfer in the office and when she came back, offered to help some more and brought me a bottle of water.  It was very hot and we both were sweating.   By the time I finished up, it started raining.  Please show appreciation for your employee for going above and beyond
to make sure the customer is happy.

I would recommend this facility to anybody.

name: Natasha Worthy
text:
Brenda is rude and condescending. She discussed my account with someone who works for me. We were moving items out of storage to go into a bigger office. I wasn't moving completely out, just moving a few items. She mentioned I'd not paid my bill for the month (this was on the 1st-- the bill wasn't late). She mentioned this to my office manager who I'd instructed to get certain items from storage. I'd attempted to introduce my office manager to her a few days before and she wasn't there. When I spoke with Brenda, she told me she needed to know what I was doing. I told her she did not because I wasn't completely moving out. I had problems with her last year.

Do NOT rent from them! I'm actually moving from there because anyone who'd discuss, mention or otherwise engage in conversation about my bill to an unauthorized person is not to be trusted.

I complained about this two days ago and no one has even followed up with me. They don't care about their customers.

resp.text:
Hello Natasha, we are sorry to hear that you had a poor experience while renting with us, and we understand your frustrations here. We are following up with our senior management team on your behalf, and you should expect to be contacted shortly. If there is anything further that we can do to assist, please reach out to us at feedback@istorage.com.

Sincerely,
The iStorage Team

name: Mickey Burns
text: Renter beware!! Was not told at time of rental, but the they have price increases every 6 to 12 months, last one was 12% increase, that can get expensive over a long period of time, so just be prepared for that if you decide to rent here in case they fail to tell you that or it’s buried in the rental contract and you miss reading it.

resp.text:
Hello Mickey, we are sorry to hear about your experience while renting with us. While we do occassionally increase our rates, this is done to provide a better experience to our customers by way of improvements made to facilities and covering increases to maintenance costs. We always take great care when raising rates to ensure that they happen as infrequently as possible, and with impact as dictated by the market. Even with that, we always try to provide the smallest possible increase. If there is anything we can do to assist you further, please reach us at feedback@istorage.com.

Sincerely,
The iStorage Decatur - Deere Rd Team

text: If this storage building wasn’t the only one near by I would have rented somewhere else. The manager is rude and yelled at my movers whenever they were dropping my belongings off at my unit. There were items left over from the last tenant that the manager said she was going to get out and never did. They also rented the unit I had reserved online without even calling me about it. They are expensive for what you get. Also be aware that the price of your unit is not a fixed rate like they tell you and it is subject to change (not disclosed whenever you start renting). They also tell you they prorate a month if you were moving out, what they don't tell you is that they only prorate if you are out by the 5th of the month.

resp.text: Hi Ali, the staff at iStorage Priceville take our reviews very seriously and we appreciate you taking the time to share your concerns with us. It is thanks to feedback like yours that we can tackle issues that may impact our most valuable asset; our customers. I have sent your comments to the management at iStorage Priceville for review. We look forward to serving you in the future. If there is anything more we can do to improve your experience please email us at info@istorage.com or give us a call toll-free at 844-311-2342. Best Regards, the iStorage Team.

name: Lilly P
text: AWESOME EXPERIENCE. SAFE SECURE LOCATION. Five Star customer service! I had to put my things in storage for a bit, moving from one state to another. Basically my entire life was in that storage unit, and it’s hard to TRUST that all your things are going to be ok. Naturally I think of every worst case scenario, flooding, theft, mice. I chose this facility because it is gated, well lit, secure, and the website says the manager lives on site. I paid extra for the air-conditioned unit, and it was very easy to load my things into. When I moved my things out 2 weeks early… I got a phone call from Christy. Asking if I was permanently moved out… That thoroughly impressed me for a variety of reasons. A) they proactively reached out to me to ensure my stuff was OK & to make sure I was ok with turning auto-pay off. How many companies would just bill you for another month and hope you forgot to cancel? Also, when I asked how she knew I moved out the night before, they said they walk the grounds every morning and inspect every unit to make sure there wasn’t damage. If I ever need a storage unit again in the future, I will absolutely use this place. That gave me such a great feeling that my things are secure, and to know they’re inspecting every single unit every day. That’s awesome. You can definitely trust this place with your stuff!

resp.text: We appreciate you taking the time to share your feedback, Lilly. We know that your items are important to you, so we make it a priority to provide a safe and secure self-storage experience. It’s important to us that you feel appreciated as our customer; we are here to help at 888-STORAGE if anything comes up.

name: Christin French
text: AWESOME EXPERIENCE. FRIENDLY CUSTOMER SERVICE. I rarely take the time to write reviews but I had to share my experience! I had to put my things in storage for a bit, moving from one state to another. Basically my entire life was in that storage unit, and it’s hard to TRUST that all your things are going to be ok. Naturally I think of every worst case scenario, flooding, theft, mice. I chose this facility because it is gated, well lit, secure, and the website says the manager lives on site. I paid extra for the air-conditioned unit, and it was very easily accessible and easy to load my things into. When I moved my things out 2 weeks early… I got a phone call from Christy. Asking if I was permanently moved out… That thoroughly impressed me for a variety of reasons. A) they proactively reached out to me to ensure my stuff was OK & to make sure I was ok with turning auto-pay off. How many companies would just bill you for another month and hope you forgot to notify them? Also, when I asked how she knew if I moved out, they said they walk the grounds every morning and inspect every unit to make sure there wasn’t damage. If I ever need a storage unit again in the future, I will absolutely use this place. That gave me such a great feeling that my things are secure, and to know they’re inspecting every single unit every day. That’s awesome. You can definitely trust this place with your stuff!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind words, Christin. We really appreciate you taking the time to share your feedback with us. name: Kyle E
text: This morning I was looking for a place to store unnessisary items that I do not need or use at all. While I am a college student I wanted a place to store my items to make my appartment a happy livable space. Today I went to store 8477 and met a very lovely associate named April Goodman and while  I was there she treated me not only as a customer, but it welt like during the our time felt like family. When I asked to see the 5' by 7' we looked at the unit and it was not something i was looking for. However when she suggested a 5' by 15' we needed to walk to the very far building on the property to view the unit. Ms. April recommended the golf cart. I told her we did not need to use it since it is a beautiful day out and it would be a nice walk to get exercise. As walking down I told her I might not like the 15' size and asked about the 5' by 8' and that it was the last one available and that we needed to walk back to the main building to see it. As we were walking to the last building she asked if I still wanted to see the 15 footer and I asked her please. When we walked back to the 5 by 8 room I walked in it and i felt in love with the space that it had its own light and also own air vent. I told her it was sold and we went back to the office and did all the paper work and I am now renting a air controlled 5' by 8' and so far I love it. As I was loading my unit an hour ago I loaded a car load in the unit then walked to the office to ask a question. As I opened the door to the office I was looking into the office smiling and as I was walking in Ms. April's office phone rang and Ms. Lechelle in the desk right next to her asked me how can i help you. As I was walking in I did not notice Ms. Lechelle asking me that question. So as I continued walking into the office Ms. Lechelle rudely asked me how may I help you. I asked my question and left the office not happy with the tone she was talking to me in as a paying customer. I do not appresiate that at all. Next time I go to the office to get help I will only make sure that I only ask miss april for help no matter if there are 2 people in the office or if she is off I will only work with her. Overall I love the facility and I would gladly recommend it to my friends and family if they ever need any storage rooms. But because of the rude experience I will only rate this 4 stars!!!!!!!!!

resp.text: Hi Kyle, thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. We aim to provide the highest level of customer service and are thrilled to hear your experience with April reflects that! We're delighted to hear you are so happy with the storage unit you rented! Providing a positive experience for each of our customers is very important to us and we hope to better serve you next time you visit the office. Your recommendation means a lot to us. Thank you again for leaving us a review! Don't hesitate to give us a call at (256) 461-0235 or stop by our office if you need anything in the future!

name: Mark Clemens
text: I was very pleased with my experience. The management was very nice, respectful, communicated well and was willing to work with me when the moving van showed up. The facility is kept in excellent condition. The security is also excellent including daily checks of each unit by the management. Automated billing is offered and works well. A worry free experience. You can tell a lot about a place during the move-in and move-out processes. This place is the best. I also learned that the humidity in the Madison Alabama area is not good for cardboard boxes. Stacked cardboard boxes began to fail over time. I do recommend the tough storage tote bins from Home Depot. They hold up well and can be stacked to the ceiling. You can seal the tote bins with Ty-wraps and large moving companies will take them without an issue. The plastic tote bins also do well if it decides to rain on moving day like it did on mine. Of course, I always recommend being a good steward of the rental space keeping it clean and reporting any issues (none for me). Although not required, I always set aside a broom and dust pan and sweep out the unit to leave it as I found it or better. Mark

resp.text: We love hearing your feedback and are thrilled to know you are enjoying your experience with us, Mark! Give us a call at (256) 837-1050 if you need any future assistance. Our team is happy to help with any of your storage needs!

name: Steven Miley
text: Good facilities, great staff.  The units are decently priced (ask about specials) and come in a variety of sizes, and they're easily accessible.  The huge sign out front makes it hard to miss for movers or friends helping you move.  The manager (Stephanie) is more than willing to accommodate your needs.  I had to move out of my apartment in Huntsville while working in Alaska and she helped me remotely select a storage unit, coordinate delivery of my furniture with the movers, and also my car with my neighbor when I was unable to be there, and when I finally showed up 3 months later she had the key ready in my file and even gave me a ride when I found out my car battery was dead.  (Thanks again!)

name: Drew Wallburg
text: Who would have thought you could enjoy renting a storage unit?! The unit is in great condition, prices are reasonable, and Amanda was the best part. Her customer service is so far off the chain that I'm not convinced it was ever solidly attached to begin with. If "on fleek" were still a thing, that's what Extra Space Storage would be. As a matter of fact, Amanda was so great, that I changed my daughter's name to Amanda. I also changed my son's name to Amanda. He wasn't as thrilled, but we can't live in the past...

name: Ted Rosseter
text:
I found this storage company while looking for a place to park my RV. I found that place just up the road and was leaving there when I noticed The Storage Neighbor lot. Since I was also looking for a place to store some things, I stopped and went in. It turned out to be one of the smarter things I have done recently!

Stephanie was on the phone helping a customer with what appeared to be a difficult situation and it took her a while to straighten things out. But that didn't bother me. I knew that if I ever had a problem, she would help me solve it. And that realization gave me a warm fuzzy feeling about having stopped there!

My unit is in a new building, bright and clean, with a smooth running, sturdy door and will be a pleasure to work with - unlike some other storage lockers I have had.

Stephanie is a hoot to work with and I have already started a list of "excuses" to stop by the office. Thank you Stephanie!

name: Tony Weeks
text: Horrible experience, would rate lower but not able. Paid for a storage that was 8-10 inches shorter than advertised. Then upgraded to a larger storage only to find that the property was not properly leveled, so they made up the difference in about 6-8 inches of concrete. The additional height of the concrete pad along with the raised flooring placed for drainage created the unit non-usable for trailers. After finding all this out I was refused a refund or even an alternative solution. Was then ghosted for a few weeks only to get a call stating basically not their problem.

resp.text:
Hello Tony, we are sorry to hear that you had a poor experience while renting with us. We always strive to provide our customers with a smooth and hassle free storage experience, and from your account this was not the case. If there is anything further you would like to let us know, please reach out to us at feedback@istorage.com.

Sincerely,
The iStorage Team

name: Rebecca Pullen
text: FEES FEES FEES! Don't be fooled by their low prices online. They charge $15 for insurance and even if you show them your declaration page from your homeowners insurance they will say your insurance doesn't cover everything. This is true, for a storage unit AND your house. But it is still sufficient. Then they say something else, then something else.... And demand you pay their monthly fee. We cancelled and went to a properly run storage unit.

resp.text:
Hello Rebecca, we are sorry to hear that you had a poor experience while renting with us. Our goal is to provide our customers with the best storage experience possible -- this includes preventing your insurance premiums from going up by using your homeowners policy. When possible, we recommend using the protection plan we offer, as it kicks in before a homeowner policy, and does not cause your premiums to increase. If there is anything more we could do, please let us know at feedback@istorage.com.

Sincerely,
The iStorage Team

name: Jason Nicklaus
text: My family recently rented a unit here and honestly in my experience most all storage units are about the same. Our deciding factor to rent here was the service we received by Debbie along with appearance and cleanliness of the property. She took the time to show us the unit and ask questions to make sure the space we looked at would be the correct size for our needs. That may seem like a given but other places in the area made it seem like a chore to show us the rental space if they showed it at all. Debbie also took the time to make certain we had the packing materials we needed and made suggestions on packing materials we were not aware of. Debbie also did a great job at explaining the lease and the services we were paying for. This place while similar wasn't the cheapest we inquired about but the service provided by Debbie along with the cleanliness of the property by far made this the best value in the area in my opinion.

resp.text: Thanks, Jason Nicklaus, for leaving us a five-star review! It's great to hear that we were all you expected and more. We select, train and coach our team around the idea that customers deserve memorable and positive experiences. As such, we are delighted to read how our staff delivered above and beyond your expectations. We sincerely look forward to serving you time after time. Looking forward to your next visit, your friends at iStorage.

name: Zach J
text:
I stored some furniture and appliances in a 10' x 10' outdoor storage unit here from April 2018 through November 2018 while searching for a house. I had a great experience with the staff and facility, and I will recommend them to anyone I know looking for storage.

Moving in was a breeze. Entering and exiting the facility through the secure gate is easy peasy, and there's tons of room to maneuver a large truck to unload your stuff straight into your storage unit.

All of my things were in great shape when I moved out. My storage unit was clean and in proper order when I moved in and moved out. I didn't have any issues with pests or vermin taking residence in my stuff or the storage unit.

The staff are incredibly friendly, fastidious, and accomodating. If you have any questions, they'll give you a straight answer, and they're really on top of their game when it comes to keeping the place in tip top shape.

Long story short: this is a great place to keep your stuff.

resp.text:
Hey Zach, we are very happy to hear that you had a great experience when renting with us. This is exactly what we expect when customers walk through our doors, and it is very reassuring to hear what we are doing right. If there is anything we could have done to give you a better experience, please reach out to us at feedback@istorage.com.

Sincerely,
iStorage Madison Jetplex

name: Brandon West
text:
I needed to rent a Uhaul trailer to do some home improvements and this particular location had the trailer I needed. I scheduled the rental via Uhaul's website the night prior and came in during the next morning to pick up the rental. My first impression of the facility upon driving up was that it looked clean, well organized, and secure. When I walked in, I was surprised how organized and clean the office was, and was also pleased with the view of all of the cameras monitoring the storage units and the facility grounds.

As far as the rental went, everything went super smoothly. Sarah was knowledgeable, quick, efficient, and nice!  I've rented a few Uhauls in my life being prior military and this was by far the nicest and smoothest rental I've ever done. The facility impressed me enough during my visit that it'll be the first place I pick if I need to store my boat, trailer, or rent a storage unit.

Thank you Sarah!

name: Nick Beadle
text: Wasn't pleased about the month notice they gave me about increasing the rent fee.  Basically suggesting pay the increase or leave.  Management sucks.... In-store and District.  Called customer care line and was told either one will call me... never happened.

resp.text: Hi Nick Beadle , the staff at iStorage Laceys Spring take our reviews very seriously and we appreciate you taking the time to share your concerns with us. It is thanks to feedback like yours that we can tackle issues that may impact our most valuable asset; our customers. I have sent your comments to the management at iStorage Laceys Spring for review and you should have received a call from the District Manager to discuss your concerns. We value all our customers and work hard to keep our prices competitive and fair. Unfortunately, operating cost such as property taxes, insurance, maintenance, utilities, overhead, etc. are not stable and increase year over year.  For us to maintain excellent service levels we must pass along a portion of those increases to our customers.  In addition, unlike several of our competitors who raise rents every couple of months, we process increases annually.  We are continuing to make improvements throughout the facility including asphalt, paint and building repairs to ensure that your experience at iStorage is the best possible. We look forward to serving you in the future. If there is anything more we can do to improve your experience please email us at info@istorage.com or give us a call toll free at 844-311-2342. Best Regards, the iStorage Team.

name: Megan Hornbuckle
text: Overall we had a good experience reserving and moving in.  The facility is clean, well lit, and seems safe enough that I wouldn't mind going by myself or in the evenings.  The onsite manager was very sweet and helpful.  She had our unit open and ready for us to help us find it which was great.  The only reason I didn't give them 5 stars was that I had a few issues with the call-line.  They were having computer issues and it took quite a while to reserve the unit. We got disconnected multiple times and had to repeat information over and over because the computer kept shutting down.  They were very apologetic and always called back promptly. I'm sure this was an isolated issue and I thought they handled it well considering it was frustrating for them as well. I would definitely recommend them to friends.

name: Marcus Ferguson
text:
Borderline criminal behavior and unwilling to honor their promise. We were quoted a fair price for the storage unit. We were also told that if we presented proof of our homeowners insurance (which we did) that we would avoid paying their monthly warranty fee. Well, I was unable to pay my first bill online because their website wasn't cooperating. I called and had them email my account info to me again. Still didn't work. So I called and asked if I could pay over the phone without having to pay the customer service fee they usually assess for phone payments. The lady agreed, which was great, but guess what was also included on the bill...the warranty fee!  I really didn't notice until I received the invoice for the following month, and wouldn't you know it, there is that warranty fee again! So I called the iStorage location to get it cleared up. She removed the warranty fee from the upcoming bill, but refused to credit my account for the prior month's overpayment because I paid over the phone! The way I see it, that type of behavior is, at the very least, wildly unethical, and may even be criminal.

Edit/Update: I just received a call from a nice lady from iStorage.  She apologized for the error and credited my account.  I'm still dissatisfied with the individuals at the Central Parkway location for their actions, but I'm relieved that someone from iStorage (corporate, I'm guessing) had enough integrity to make things right.

resp.text: Hello, Mr. Ferguson, I hope we were able to resolve this issue to your satisfaction. We apologize for the mistake and genuinely look forward to serving you in the future, happy and satisfied customers are our number one priority. The iStorage Team.

name: Rebecca Moore
text: The price went up 4 - 5 times in the 2 years I rented a unit. Ridiculous.

resp.text: We value all our customers and work hard to keep our prices competitive and fair. Unfortunately, operating cost such as property taxes, insurance, maintenance, utilities, overhead, etc. are not stable and increase year over year.  For us to maintain excellent service levels we must pass along a portion of those increases to our customers.  In addition, unlike several of our competitors who raise rents every couple of months, we process increases annually.  We are continuing to make improvements throughout the facility including asphalt, paint and building repairs to ensure that your experience at iStorage is the best possible. We look forward to serving you in the future. If there is anything more we can do to improve your experience please email us at info@istorage.com or give us a call toll free at 844-311-2342. Best Regards, the iStorage Team.

name: Brian Reese
text:
Not very happy with Halls Mill location. I have rent 2 10X20 storage units for the last 2 years. One is climate control and the other is not. They keep raising there rates on me every year. Just received another letter saying they are going to raise up again for the 2nd time. Customer service always has been an attitude with me.Try to pay my bills online this last month just like have always done in the past and it wouldnt let pay. So I call TK to inform her of the website not working and she care inform me that there is a service fee for them to take my credit card payment over the phone. They made me pay 2 service fees since I had 2 different units since I couldn't pay my bill online because there website not working. Why should I have to pay service fee for there screw up website. She tells me is there nothing I can do about it which is BS. I have try to call corporate number and no one has call me back. Like I said, the biggest problem I have with Halls Mill location is her attitude she gives off to me.

Also, the other day I walk thru one of the climate control units to get to my unit and the inside smelled like urine. It time for me to start looking for another place that actually treat me like a customer.

resp.text:
Hello Brian, we are sorry to hear about your difficulty with payments. We offer many ways to pay including autopay and phone payments. We have notified senior management to your concerns, and working to ensure that this situation does not happen for any other customer. If there are any other issues you would like to discuss, please reach out to us at feedback@istorage.com.

Sincerely,
The iStorage Team

name: John Sullivan
text:
Have a storage unit there that Mother N law and i have had for approximately ten years.  My husbands belongings from his divorce are in it and my mother in law has been paying it.  She is 83 years old and has had a stroke.  I have been paying her bills since August.  The guy there knows that i pay the bill.  I've never been called for a late bill and as I live in her house now to provide her care, i would know if she had been called. It's never been late.   Now they are calling and harrassing her for money because a LATE fee will be added on TOMORROW.  I tried to call Yesterday and NO ONE would answer.  I've paid it on the 5th of EVERY month since I've been paying the bills and I get a woman....(always been a very nice man in the past) who is a witch and says she is the manager.  I became angry with her and asked her what I needed to do to close agreement out as I was going to come get my things out of the unit.  She said my mother in law would have to come there to do it.  She KNOWS my mother in law is bed ridden and can't handle the account.  I even got my mother in olaw to tell her she could discuss the account with me...........she insists that SHE has to come by to sign off on the contract.  She advised my mother in law that she set her up on AUTO PAY.  I promise you I will have a new Debit card and I dare her to try to charge anything on this account.  They won't get one more dime out of me!!!

Since I can't respond to the response I received on this.....I will say that My husband IS ON THE LEASE.  It is HIS belongings.  My mother in law just use to pay it.  And "Witch" was a nice way of saying so much more.......... She was awful and lost long term customers...not to mention, i discourage anyone from using this location.

resp.text: Hi John, My name is Evan. I am not a manager but I am part of the support staff at iStorage. I think there is some misunderstanding because we cannot give out customer information to someone who isn't on the lease...and you can't cancel a lease if you aren't on it. If you can have Wanda add her daughter-in-law to the lease, then she can have control of the account. Since Wanda can't come down to the facility, she has the ability to add her daughter-in-law to the lease over the phone. If you have any other questions please give me a call at 805-570-5528. Also, please do not call our manager a "witch" - we can get everything resolved without the name calling.
